channel.title: Dawn of War II Terminator armor question
channel.description:
Hello all! Have anyone of you played Dawn of War II trough before? Since I just finished it, I have my squads upgraded to max, reached the lvl cap and stuff, got the trait to wear terminator armor and weaponry, and the problem is that i found a lot of terminator gear, but still no terminator armor.And the weapons and accessories need the main terminator armor or hauberk but damn where to find any? If anyone of you found any type of main armor before, please tell me where because i'd really like to see one of my squads in terminator action...Thanks, and sorry for useing the terminator word that much :stuck_out_tongue:
PS.: I'm talking about the Campaing session, not the skirmish.

item.title: Dawn of War II Terminator armor question
item.dc:creator: Moonpooman
item.description:
baconeggs:

I’m not sure these blokes would appreciate being called power rangers.

[Picture]

,[/SIZE]

not really

By the way, Baconeggs, your picture is much better than the [OLD] one i found.

Read full topic

item.title: Dawn of War II Terminator armor question
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
Thank you all, really!
No, not Power Rangers, something faaar more bigger, It’s called the Warhammer 40k universe, go check it, it’s worth it!
There are games, books and other good things like that, don’t miss it!

Read full topic

item.title: Dawn of War II Terminator armor question
item.dc:creator: Haze
item.description:
Hrm, last I can remember (havent played since Games for windows live LOST MY FUCKING GAME SAVES RAWR!), I beleive you gain it as part of a side-mission, before using the Angel Forge weapons.

Read full topic
item.source: Dawn of War II Terminator armor question

item.title: Dawn of War II Terminator armor question
item.dc:creator: Wasabi
item.description:
There is a mission wherein some Terminator Armour is obtained, and afterwards more Terminator armour is obtainable via the standard drop system. You must just not have advanced in the missions far enough yet.

Read full topic
